name: Real Horse Jumping Sports pro
description:
Have you ever wanted to have an adventurous horse ride in the jungle? Have you ever wanted to ride your horse through all the obstacles of dark jungle? So here your dream come true, Horse Jumping Adventure 2017 is all what you need. Your main objective is to collect the gems and diamonds coming in your way and avoid the obstacles and obstructions.

This amazing endless horse jumping adventure is a fun game filled up with gems, diamonds, obstacles and hudles, just keep on collecting the gems and diamonds in your path. Be the real survival hero in the smashy run.

Challenging gameplay shall not be easy for you, only the perfect horse riding skills in this arcade style game shall be needed to ride your horse into wild dark jungle.

How to play:
-Tilt for left and Right
-Swipe left or right for turn
-There are two controls (arrows and swipe)
-Choose what ease you

Features:
-Beautiful 3D graphics
-Amazing environment
-Smooth animations
-Asthetic GUI
-User friendly interface
-Perfect Controls
For suggestions and queries you may contact us through email: soloftech2017@gamil.com
